Social media and Twitter queen Chrissy Teigen recently took to her Instagram page to post a hilarious photo last Sunday, March 4, 2018. Looking gorgeous as always, in what was not a staged photo at all, hopped onto social media au naturel, sporting nothing but two salad emojis. A currently pregnant Teigen, posed in her modern kitchen making a salad and was covered up with a well - placed towel and some emojis. Via PEOPLE In addition to the hilarious photo
